net.dean.jraw.fluent

Class FlairReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.fluent.AbstractReference
      • net.dean.jraw.fluent.ElevatedAbstractReference
        • net.dean.jraw.fluent.FlairReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reference

    public final class FlairReference
extends ElevatedAbstractReference
    A Reference to a flair. Note that currently this only applies to user flair, not submission flair.
